data.title: Student Information System - SIS Help
data.text:
Click myVPCC at the top of the VPCC website

Enter your Username and Password - If you do not remember your Password or Username click on the appropriate link below the SIGN IN button.

Click Log In

The next page displays tiles to Canvas, Student Email, SIS: Student Information System and Navigate

Click on SIS: Student Information System

When you are finished, always remember to Sign Out to ensure the security and privacy of your account information.

If you need assistance contact the IT Helpdesk at (757) 825-2709.

Log in to myVPCC

Click SIS: Student Information System

Click My Student Information

Click Enrollment

Add Classes

Choose a Term and click Continue

Select Search for Classes and click Search.

Select a Subject and click Search

Select the Class to Add

Click Next

Click Proceed to step 2 of 3

Click Finish Enrolling

Log in to myCVCC

Click SIS: Student Information System

Click My Student Information

Click Enrollment

Click Drop Classes

Select a Term and click Continue

Place a checkmark next to the class you wish to drop.

Click the Drop selected class button

Click Finish Dropping

Refer to the Academic Calendar for important dates before dropping a class.

Log in to myCVCC

Click SIS: Student Information System

Click My Student Information

Click Enrollment

Click Swap Classes

Select a Term and click Continue

Select the class in your schedule that you want to swap out from the drop-down menu.

Choose Search for Classes and click the search button.

Select a Subject and click search

Click Select by the class you want to swap.

Click Next

Click Finish Swapping

Log in to myVPCC

Click SIS: Student Information Center

Click My Student Information

Your To Do list will be on the right side of the screen

Log in to myVPCC

Click on SIS: Student Information Center

Click My Student Information

Click Make a Payment

Takes you to tuition payment system

Click Make a Payment

Select Student Tuition

Enter amount you would like to pay (by default the total amount owed populates the text box)

Click Next- Payment Method

Select either bank account or credit card

Put in account information

Save and continue

Follow on-screen directions

Note: DO NOT click Back button as payment could be submitted multiple times.

Tuition due dates and other payment info can be found here: How to pay and here : Tuition and Fees

Log in to myVPCC

Click on SIS: Student Information Center

Click My Student Information

Click Personal Information

Click Addresses

Click the Edit button beside the Address you would like to update

Make your changes

Click Ok and Save

Log in to myVPCC

Click on SIS: Student Information System

Click My Student Information

Click Enrollment

Click My Class Schedule

Click the link titled Bookstore Textbook Information

or

Access the VPCC Bookstore online

Click on Textbooks or Find Courses

Enter the term and course information and then click Find Materials
